TRACK.NAME: SANDY RIDGE AT THE RED MILE

RACE.RACE_TEXT: SANDY RIDGE AT THE RED MILE RACE 1 110 Y Dirt CR: 70. Allowance Purse 24000. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 126 lbs.; Older, 128 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: CAPORAL RUNAWAY broke in, led, held. RAZEN CANE brushed start, rallied, missed. FALCON brushed start, chased. LOUISIANA SASS no factor. ZAN WAGON floated in start, gave way.

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BOCO Overnight S. SANDY RIDGE AT THE RED MILE RACE 6 300 Y Dirt CR: 90. Stakes Purse 45000. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD. No Nominations. Enter to run. The purse will be divided, 60% to first, 20% to second, 12% to third, 5% to fourth, and 3% to fifth. Weights: Three year Olds, 126 lbs.; Older, 128 lbs. Preference to horses with the Highest L ifetime Earnings as of March 24, 2023. This race will be limited to 10 starters. Starters to be named through the entry box on Saturday, March 30, 2023 by the usual time of closing.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: JESS B ONE led, held gamely. HALLMARKE pressed, denied. HIGH ROLLING SEIZE shifted out start, gaining. AJK ENTHUSIASM clean trip outside. A SEPERATIST V broke in, no factor. THE ARTFUL DODGER slow start.
